reviews.comments: Amazing experience! The food was delicious, and the staff were incredibly friendly and attentive. Highly recommend!
Great atmosphere and tasty dishes. The service was a bit slow, but overall a very good dining experience.
The food was average, and the portions were smaller than expected. The ambiance was nice, but I felt it was a bit overpriced.
Absolutely loved it! The chef's special was out of this world, and the desserts were to die for. Will definitely be back!
Not impressed. The food was bland and the service was subpar. The wait time was too long, and it was quite noisy.
